string: 1)  Perform immunohistochemistry for chemokine receptors CXCR1, CXCR3 and CXCR4 on first trimester human placental paraffin-embedded sections as previously described \[1], with microwave antigen retrieval using sodium citrate buffer \(Zymed Laboratory Inc, San- Francisco, CA, USA).
refer: as previously described refers to the method of performing immunohistochemistry for chemokine receptors CXCR1, CXCR3, and CXCR4 on first trimester human placental paraffin-embedded sections.

string: 3)  Perform immunohistochemistry on decidual sections with NCR-Fc fusion proteins \(prepared as previously described 3) by microwave heating the formalin-fixed, paraffin embedded tissue sections in citrate buffer in order to retrieve antigens.
refer: as previously described refers to the method of preparing NCR-Fc fusion proteins by microwave heating the formalin-fixed, paraffin embedded tissue sections in citrate buffer in order to retrieve antigens.
